name: Riddim
description: Repetitive and relatively simplistic style inspired by mid-to-late-2000s UK Dubstep, often using robotic and/or squishy sound design along with bouncy square basses and less prominent buildups.

children.name: Future Riddim
children.description: Melodic and futuristic style inspired by Future Bass, and to a lesser extent Colour Bass and Melodic Dubstep.

children.name: Future Riddim
children.description: Melodic and futuristic style inspired by Future Bass, and to a lesser extent Colour Bass and Melodic Dubstep.

children.name: Liquid Riddim
children.description: Distinct for its atmospheric production, overpowering ambience, watery synths, and melodic bass patterns.
